content.question: In the opening sentence, the author assumes which of the following about his audience?

choices.label: They are familiar with the phrase “life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.”
They view the phrase “life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness” with skepticism.
They view individual freedom as both a gift and a problem.
They are probably unfamiliar with the principle of individual freedom.

content.answer: They are familiar with the phrase “life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.”

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
